problem_text: Let k be a positive integer such that there is an insoluble finite group with exactly k conjugacy classes. Is it true that a finite group of maximal order with exactly k conjugacy classes is insoluble? R. Heffernan, D. MacHale
answer: No, it is not; see Table 1 in (A. Vera-Lopez, J. Sangroniz, Math. Nachr., 280, no. 5–6 (2007), 676–694).
